name: com.sapra.object-controller
description:
Object Controller that allows for multitud of process, 
stack inside an easy to edit and see monobehaviour

samples.description: Contains implementations of the most basic scripts to be created to have something visual
Contains implementations of a character controller, capable to Swim, Walk, Jump, Move in the Air, and other actions
Contains the basic empty layout for a character controller without a single action in it
Contains a full character controller with working fields
